page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: {Montrose}has many recreational facilities which are widely used by the public. For the sports conscious the newly built{Sports Centre}is the place to go.Opened in November 1983,it consists of 1 main games hall,2 squash courts, lounge and small activities rooms. There is also an extensive multi-gym. Apart from the{Sports Centre}there are facilities for tennis,cricket,rugby, bowling,golf,badminton,swimming and sailing. A more leisurely person can take part in angling,darts or even just walking along the beach or through the town's many parks. {Montrose}also boasts 2 football teams. A junior side,Roselea,and a senior squad who have recently won the 2nd Division Championship to gain promotion to Division One.
